title: What made Donald Trump correlate vaccines with autism?
description: Answer (1 of 6): What made Donald Trump correlate vaccines with autism? Just a guess, but I suspect it's from personal experience. There have been reports—unconfirmed as far as I know—that Barron Trump is either autistic or may lie somewhere on the autism spectrum . . . which also could include ...
